an8.51:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
an8.51:1.2: Atha kho mahapajapati gotami yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho mahapajapati gotami bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.51:1.3: “sadhu, bhante, labheyya matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:1.5: Ma te rucci matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajja”ti.
an8.51:2.1: Dutiyampi kho mahapajapati gotami bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.51:2.2: “sadhu, bhante, labheyya matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:2.4: Ma te rucci matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajja”ti.
an8.51:3.1: Tatiyampi kho mahapajapati gotami bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.51:3.2: “sadhu, bhante, labheyya matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:3.4: Ma te rucci matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajja”ti.
an8.51:4.1: Atha kho mahapajapati gotami “na bhagava anujanati matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan”ti dukkhi dummana assumukhi rudamana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
an8.51:5.1: Atha kho bhagava kapilavatthusmim yathabhirantam viharitva yena vesali tena carikam pakkami.
an8.51:5.2: Anupubbena carikam caramano yena vesali tadavasari.
an8.51:5.3: Tatra sudam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an8.51:5.4: Atha kho mahapajapati gotami kese chedapetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva sambahulahi sakiyanihi saddhim yena vesali tena pakkami.
an8.51:5.5: Anupubbena yena vesali mahavanam kutagarasala tenupasankami.
an8.51:5.6: Atha kho mahapajapati gotami sunehi padehi rajokinnena gattena dukkhi dummana assumukhi rudamana bahidvarakotthake atthasi.
an8.51:6.1: Addasa kho ayasma anando mahapajapatim gotamim sunehi padehi rajokinnena gattena dukkhim dummanam assumukhim rudamanam bahidvarakotthake thitam.
an8.51:6.3: “kim nu tvam, gotami, sunehi padehi rajokinnena gattena dukkhi dummana assumukhi rudamana bahidvarakotthake thita”ti?
an8.51:6.4: “Tatha hi pana, bhante ananda, na bhagava anujanati matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:6.5: “Tena hi tvam, gotami, muhuttam idheva tava hohi, yavaham bhagavantam yacami matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:7.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.51:7.2: “esa, bhante, mahapajapati gotami sunehi padehi rajokinnena gattena dukkhi dummana assumukhi rudamana bahidvarakotthake thita:
an8.51:7.3: ‘na bhagava anujanati matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan’ti.
an8.51:7.4: Sadhu, bhante, labheyya matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:7.6: Ma te rucci matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajja”ti.
an8.51:8.2: tatiyampi kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.51:8.3: “sadhu, bhante, labheyya matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:8.5: Ma te rucci matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajja”ti.
an8.51:9.2: “na bhagava anujanati matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjam.
an8.51:9.3: Yannunaham annenapi pariyayena bhagavantam yaceyyam matugamassa tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:9.4: Atha kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.51:9.5: “bhabbo nu kho, bhante, matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajitva sotapattiphalam va sakadagamiphalam va anagamiphalam va arahattaphalam va sacchikatun”ti?
an8.51:9.6: “Bhabbo, ananda, matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajitva sotapattiphalampi sakadagamiphalampi anagamiphalampi arahattaphalampi sacchikatun”ti.
an8.51:9.7: “Sace, bhante, bhabbo matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajitva sotapattiphalampi …pe… arahattaphalampi sacchikatum;
an8.51:9.8: bahukara, bhante, mahapajapati gotami bhagavato matuccha apadika posika khirassa dayika;
an8.51:9.10: Sadhu, bhante, labheyya matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:10.1: “Sace, ananda, mahapajapati gotami attha garudhamme patigganhati, savassa hotu upasampada—
an8.51:11.1: Vassasatupasampannaya bhikkhuniya tadahupasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivadanam paccutthanam anjalikammam samicikammam kattabbam.
an8.51:11.2: Ayampi dhammo sakkatva garum katva manetva pujetva yavajivam anatikkamaniyo.
an8.51:12.1: Na bhikkhuniya abhikkhuke avase vassam upagantabbam.
an8.51:12.2: Ayampi dhammo sakkatva garum katva manetva pujetva yavajivam anatikkamaniyo.
an8.51:13.1: Anvaddhamasam bhikkhuniya bhikkhusanghato dve dhamma paccasisitabba—
an8.51:13.3: Ayampi dhammo sakkatva garum katva manetva pujetva yavajivam anatikkamaniyo.
an8.51:14.1: Vassamvutthaya bhikkhuniya ubhatosanghe tihi thanehi pavaretabbam—
an8.51:14.2: ditthena va sutena va parisankaya va.
an8.51:14.3: Ayampi dhammo sakkatva garum katva manetva pujetva yavajivam anatikkamaniyo.
an8.51:15.1: Garudhammam ajjhapannaya bhikkhuniya ubhatosanghe pakkhamanattam caritabbam.
an8.51:15.2: Ayampi dhammo sakkatva garum katva manetva pujetva yavajivam anatikkamaniyo.
an8.51:16.1: Dve vassani chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaya sikkhamanaya ubhatosanghe upasampada pariyesitabba.
an8.51:16.2: Ayampi dhammo sakkatva garum katva manetva pujetva yavajivam anatikkamaniyo.
an8.51:17.1: Na kenaci pariyayena bhikkhuniya bhikkhu akkositabbo paribhasitabbo.
an8.51:17.2: Ayampi dhammo sakkatva garum katva manetva pujetva yavajivam anatikkamaniyo.
an8.51:18.1: Ajjatagge ovato bhikkhuninam bhikkhusu vacanapatho, anovato bhikkhunam bhikkhunisu vacanapatho.
an8.51:18.2: Ayampi dhammo sakkatva garum katva manetva pujetva yavajivam anatikkamaniyo.
an8.51:19.1: Sace, ananda, mahapajapati gotami ime attha garudhamme patigganhati, savassa hotu upasampada”ti.
an8.51:20.1: Atha kho ayasma anando bhagavato santike ime attha garudhamme uggahetva yena mahapajapati gotami tenupasankami; upasankamitva mahapajapatim gotamim etadavoca:
an8.51:21.1: “Sace kho tvam, gotami, attha garudhamme patigganheyyasi, sava te bhavissati upasampada—
an8.51:22.1: Vassasatupasampannaya bhikkhuniya tadahupasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivadanam paccutthanam anjalikammam samicikammam kattabbam.
an8.51:22.2: Ayampi dhammo sakkatva garum katva manetva pujetva yavajivam anatikkamaniyo …pe….
an8.51:23.1: Ajjatagge ovato bhikkhuninam bhikkhusu vacanapatho, anovato bhikkhunam bhikkhunisu vacanapatho.
an8.51:23.2: Ayampi dhammo sakkatva garum katva manetva pujetva yavajivam anatikkamaniyo.
an8.51:23.3: Sace kho tvam, gotami, ime attha garudhamme patigganheyyasi, sava te bhavissati upasampada”ti.
an8.51:24.1: “Seyyathapi, bhante ananda, itthi va puriso va daharo yuva mandanakajatiko sisamnhato uppalamalam va vassikamalam va adhimuttakamalam va labhitva ubhohi hatthehi patiggahetva uttamange sirasmim patitthapeyya;
an8.51:24.2: evamevam kho aham, bhante ananda, ime attha garudhamme patigganhami yavajivam anatikkamaniye”ti.
an8.51:25.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.51:25.2: “patiggahita, bhante, mahapajapatiya gotamiya attha garudhamma yavajivam anatikkamaniya”ti.
an8.51:26.1: “Sace, ananda, nalabhissa matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajjam, ciratthitikam, ananda, brahmacariyam abhavissa, vassasahassameva saddhammo tittheyya.
an8.51:26.2: Yato ca kho, ananda, matugamo tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajito, na dani, ananda, brahmacariyam ciratthitikam bhavissati.
an8.51:26.3: Panceva dani, ananda, vassasatani saddhammo thassati.
an8.51:27.1: Seyyathapi, ananda, yani kanici kulani bahutthikani appapurisakani, tani suppadhamsiyani honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi;
an8.51:27.2: evamevam kho, ananda, yasmim dhammavinaye labhati matugamo agarasma anagariyam pabbajjam, na tam brahmacariyam ciratthitikam hoti.
an8.51:28.1: Seyyathapi, ananda, sampanne salikkhette setatthika nama rogajati nipatati, evam tam salikkhettam na ciratthitikam hoti;
an8.51:28.2: evamevam kho, ananda, yasmim dhammavinaye labhati matugamo agarasma anagariyam pabbajjam, na tam brahmacariyam ciratthitikam hoti.
an8.51:29.1: Seyyathapi, ananda, sampanne ucchukkhette manjitthika nama rogajati nipatati, evam tam ucchukkhettam na ciratthitikam hoti;
an8.51:29.2: evamevam kho, ananda, yasmim dhammavinaye labhati matugamo agarasma anagariyam pabbajjam, na tam brahmacariyam ciratthitikam hoti.
an8.51:30.1: Seyyathapi, ananda, puriso mahato talakassa patikacceva alim bandheyya yavadeva udakassa anatikkamanaya;
an8.51:30.2: evamevam kho, ananda, maya patikacceva bhikkhuninam attha garudhamma pannatta yavajivam anatikkamaniya”ti.
